The Next Billion Online

The technologies we take for granted in industrialized places stand to elevate populations globally. However, more than half of the world lacks basic access to the internet. With open-source tools, software, and educational materials, we can change that. One router, one satellite dish at a time.

Our Mission

Technology solves the problems of rich, white people. The only way to fix that is with an intersectional analysis that targets the root causes of these disparities.

All human beings have a right to communicate freely, openly, and securely, regardless of their sex, gender, race, or class.

Technological liberation is rooted in grass-roots action, open source code, and the technologies to keep people safe, wherever they may be.

Who We Are

We are a small, horizontally organized team that seeks the change the world from the bottom up, using their privilege to better the world. If you would like to get involved, scroll down for our contact information.

Resources

We maintain a wiki, educational resources, and a code base so that you can focus on deploying and using the technology that is important to you.

Visit Download Page
